titles.title: A bill to reduce certain authorizations for the United States Travel and Tourism Administration, Department of Commerce.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10576)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the International Travel Act of 1961 to reduce certain fiscal year authorizations for the United States Travel and Tourism Administration in the Department of Commerce.
